headline: 3 Reasons to Sell MDLZ and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Since February 2025, Mondelez has been in a holding pattern, posting a small loss of 4.1% while floating around $61.61. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 8.8% gain during that period.
